body:
This PR is in response to #17082, which aims to rename the `Debug window` title to a more user friendly term; `Node window`. I have broken down the change into 3 separate commits, as I am unable to tell what the exact change the author of #17082 is requesting. As such, breaking down the changes into 3 is intended to make rebaseing easy when the specific change requested in #17082 has been clarified. 

The 3 changes are broken down as follows;

- Rename the `debug window` title/label to `node window`.
- Rename the `RPCConsole` class to `NodeWidget`.
- Rename `rpcconsole` file(s) to `nodewidget`, and update all references from `rpcconsole.h`/`rpcconsole.cpp` to `nodewidget.h`/`nodewidget.cpp` in order to reflect the change.

The effects of the initial change is to only change the `debug window` title/label to `node window`, without renaming any files or changing any classes.

The second change builds atop the first, changing the internal `RPCConsole` class to `NodeWidget`, as well as changing `debugWindow` to `nodeWindow`, etc. I have also edited a few comments to make reading the code easier in the future.

The final change again build on top of all the previous changes, renaming the associated files in `src/qt/`, like `debugwindow.ui` to `nodewindow.ui`, `rpcconsole.h`/`rpcconsole.cpp` to `nodewidget.h`/`nodewidget.cpp`.
title: gui: rename debug window
